name: Astro Storm
description:
Astro Storm
(v1.1)

by Vacek Nules

"Astro Storm" is a retro style space-themed endless vertical scroller, which was inspired by Astrododge by Revival Studios (2011) but has many new features including weapons.

Dodge falling asteroids, gain points, collect power-ups and survive as long as possible!

Features include:

  • 3 different sizes of asteroids with different point values and 3 distinct moving speeds
  • 4-layer parallax starfield background and extra-smooth sprite animation with pre-rendered 3-D asteroids
  • 6 different power-ups
  • Two kinds of collectible weapons
  • Periodic boss fights
  • Increasing difficulty (number of asteroids increasing)
  • Authentic EGA-style graphics (320x200x16 colors) with CRT-emulation renderer built in
  • Chip-style sound effects

Available for Microsoft® Windows® operating systems (tested on XP and 10).
